DOC.brief_summary: Patients develop acute coronary syndrome despite dual antiplatelet therapy aspirin clopidogrel may benefit dose clopidogrel percutaneous coronary intervention . The aim study evaluate safety effectiveness clopidogrel reload patient chronic clopidogrel therapy acute coronary syndrome undergo percutaneous coronary intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Clopidogrel Reloading Patients With NSTEACS Undergoing Percutaneous Coronary Intervention Chronic Clopidogrel Therapy
